title: Release v0.4.2 to PyPI with documentation and GitHub updates
description:
**As a** project maintainer
**I want** to release v0.4.2 to PyPI with updated documentation
**So that** users can install the latest version with SOUL-291 fixes and improvements

**Context:**
Publish new version with recent improvements:
- SOUL-291: CLI tool support fixes (tool filtering, system prompts, session handling)
- Prepare clean baseline before starting EPIC-016/017/018 work

**Prerequisites:**
- ✅ All tests passing
- ✅ CHANGELOG.md updated
- ✅ Version bumped in pyproject.toml
- ✅ Clean git status (all changes committed)

**Release Checklist:**

**1. Version & Changelog (Pre-release)**
```bash
# Update version in pyproject.toml (both locations)
# [project] version = "0.4.2"
# [tool.poetry] version = "0.4.2"

# Update CHANGELOG.md with release notes
# - Document SOUL-291 fixes
# - Add release date

# Commit version bump
git add pyproject.toml CHANGELOG.md
git commit -m "chore: bump version to 0.4.2"
git tag v0.4.2
```

**2. Build & Test (Local verification)**
```bash
# Clean build
rm -rf dist/
poetry build

# Verify build artifacts
ls -lh dist/
# Should see:
# - consoul-0.4.2.tar.gz
# - consoul-0.4.2-py3-none-any.whl

# Optional: Test with TestPyPI first
poetry publish -r testpypi
pip install --index-url https://test.pypi.org/simple/ consoul
```

**3. Publish to PyPI**
```bash
# Publish to production PyPI
poetry publish

# Verify on PyPI
# Visit: https://pypi.org/project/consoul/
```

**4. Push to GitHub**
```bash
# Push branch and tag
git push origin develop
git push origin v0.4.2

# Verify tag appears on GitHub
# https://github.com/goatbytes/consoul/tags
```

**5. Create GitHub Release**
```bash
# Using gh CLI
gh release create v0.4.2 \
  --title "v0.4.2 - CLI Tool Support Fixes" \
  --notes "See CHANGELOG.md for details" \
  dist/consoul-0.4.2.tar.gz \
  dist/consoul-0.4.2-py3-none-any.whl

# Or manually via GitHub UI:
# https://github.com/goatbytes/consoul/releases/new
# - Tag: v0.4.2
# - Title: v0.4.2 - CLI Tool Support Fixes
# - Attach: dist artifacts
# - Description: Copy from CHANGELOG.md
```

**6. Update Documentation (gh-pages)**
```bash
# Build documentation
mkdocs build

# Deploy to gh-pages
mkdocs gh-deploy

# Verify live docs
# Visit: https://goatbytes.github.io/consoul/

# Alternatively, use GitHub Actions (if configured)
# Push will trigger automatic deployment
```

**7. Verify Installation**
```bash
# Test fresh install
pip install --upgrade consoul

# Verify version
consoul --version  # Should show 0.4.2

# Test basic functionality
consoul chat  # Quick smoke test
```

**8. Update README badges (if needed)**
- PyPI version badge
- Documentation link
- Release date

**Acceptance Criteria:**

**Given** version bumped to 0.4.2
**When** I publish to PyPI
**Then** package appears at https://pypi.org/project/consoul/0.4.2/

**Given** GitHub release created
**When** I visit releases page
**Then** v0.4.2 tag with artifacts is visible

**Given** documentation deployed
**When** I visit https://goatbytes.github.io/consoul/
**Then** latest docs are live

**Given** fresh install
**When** pip install consoul
**Then** version 0.4.2 installs successfully

**Post-Release:**
- Announce on relevant channels (if applicable)
- Close this ticket
- Start work on EPIC-016 (Production SDK Hardening)

**Reference Documentation:**
- PUBLISHING.md (project root)
- CHANGELOG.md (for release notes)
- mkdocs.yml (documentation config)

**Troubleshooting:**
- Auth failed: poetry config pypi-token.pypi YOUR_TOKEN
- Version exists: Bump version number
- Build errors: rm -rf dist/ && poetry build
- Docs not updating: Clear browser cache, check gh-pages branch
